description: Retrieves the password policy for the Amazon Web Services account. This tells you the complexity requirements and mandatory rotation periods for the IAM user passwords in your account. For more information about using a password policy, see Managing an IAM password policy.

nested_items.name: PasswordPolicy
nested_items.description: A structure that contains details about the account's password policy.

nested_items.name: MinimumPasswordLength
nested_items.description: Minimum length to require for IAM user passwords.

nested_items.name: RequireSymbols
nested_items.description: Specifies whether IAM user passwords must contain at least one of the following symbols:

nested_items.name: RequireNumbers
nested_items.description: Specifies whether IAM user passwords must contain at least one numeric character (0 to 9).

nested_items.name: RequireUppercaseCharacters
nested_items.description: Specifies whether IAM user passwords must contain at least one uppercase character (A to Z).

nested_items.name: RequireLowercaseCharacters
nested_items.description: Specifies whether IAM user passwords must contain at least one lowercase character (a to z).

nested_items.name: AllowUsersToChangePassword
nested_items.description: Specifies whether IAM users are allowed to change their own password. Gives IAM users permissions to iam:ChangePassword for only their user and to the iam:GetAccountPasswordPolicy action. This option does not attach a permissions policy to each user, rather the permissions are applied at the account-level for all users by IAM.

nested_items.name: ExpirePasswords
nested_items.description: Indicates whether passwords in the account expire. Returns true if MaxPasswordAge contains a value greater than 0. Returns false if MaxPasswordAge is 0 or not present.

nested_items.name: MaxPasswordAge
nested_items.description: The number of days that an IAM user password is valid.

nested_items.name: PasswordReusePrevention
nested_items.description: Specifies the number of previous passwords that IAM users are prevented from reusing.

nested_items.name: HardExpiry
nested_items.description: Specifies whether IAM users are prevented from setting a new password via the Amazon Web Services Management Console after their password has expired. The IAM user cannot access the console until an administrator resets the password. IAM users with iam:ChangePassword permission and active access keys can reset their own expired console password using the CLI or API.
